jobActions.name: Stone
jobActions.description: Deals earth damage with a potency of 140.

jobActions.name: Cure
jobActions.description:
Restores target's HP.
Cure Potency: 500
Additional Effect: 15% chance next Cure II will cost no MP
Duration: 15s

jobActions.name: Aero
jobActions.description:
Deals wind damage with a potency of 50.
Additional Effect: Wind damage over time
Potency: 30
Duration: 30s

jobActions.name: Medica
jobActions.description:
Restores own HP and the HP of all nearby party members.
Cure Potency: 400

jobActions.name: Raise
jobActions.description: Resurrects target to a weakened state.

jobActions.name: Stone II
jobActions.description: Deals earth damage with a potency of 190.

jobActions.name: Cure II
jobActions.description:
Restores target's HP.
Cure Potency: 800

jobActions.name: Presence of Mind
jobActions.description:
Reduces spell cast time and recast time, and auto-attack delay by 20%.
Duration: 15s
Additional Effect: Grants 3 stacks of Sacred Sight
Duration: 30s
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

jobActions.name: Regen
jobActions.description:
Grants healing over time effect to target.
Cure Potency: 250
Duration: 18s

jobActions.name: Cure III
jobActions.description:
Restores own or target party member's HP and all party members nearby target.
Cure Potency: 600

jobActions.name: Aetherial Shift
jobActions.description:
Quickly dash 15 yalms forward.
Cannot be executed while bound.

jobActions.name: Holy
jobActions.description:
Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 140 to all nearby enemies.
Additional Effect: Stun
Duration: 4s

jobActions.name: Aero II
jobActions.description:
Deals wind damage with a potency of 50.
Additional Effect: Wind damage over time
Potency: 50
Duration: 30s

jobActions.name: Medica II
jobActions.description:
Restores own HP and the HP of all nearby party members.
Cure Potency: 250
Additional Effect: Regen
Cure Potency: 150
Duration: 15s

jobActions.name: Benediction
jobActions.description: Restores all of a target's HP.

jobActions.name: Afflatus Solace
jobActions.description:
Restores target's HP.
Cure Potency: 800
Additional Effect: Nourishes the Blood Lily
Healing Gauge Cost: 1 Lily

jobActions.name: Asylum
jobActions.description:
Envelops a designated area in a veil of succor, granting healing over time to self and any party members who enter.
Cure Potency: 100
Duration: 24s
Additional Effect: Increases HP recovery via healing actions on party members in the designated area by 10%

jobActions.name: Stone III
jobActions.description: Deals earth damage with a potency of 220.

jobActions.name: Assize
jobActions.description:
Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 400 to all nearby enemies.
Additional Effect: Restores own HP and the HP of nearby party members
Cure Potency: 400
Additional Effect: Restores 5% of maximum MP

jobActions.name: Thin Air
jobActions.description:
Next action is executed without MP cost.
Duration: 12s
Maximum Charges: 2

jobActions.name: Tetragrammaton
jobActions.description:
Restores target's HP.
Cure Potency: 700
Maximum Charges: 2
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

jobActions.name: Stone IV
jobActions.description: Deals earth damage with a potency of 260.

jobActions.name: Divine Benison
jobActions.description:
Creates a barrier around self or target party member that absorbs damage equivalent to a heal of 500 potency.
Duration: 15s
Maximum Charges: 2

jobActions.name: Plenary Indulgence
jobActions.description:
Grants Confession to self and nearby party members.
Duration: 10s
Party members under the effect of Confession will receive additional healing upon receiving HP recovery via Medica, Medica III, Cure III, or Afflatus Rapture.
Cure Potency: 200
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

jobActions.name: Dia
jobActions.description:
Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 75.
Additional Effect: Unaspected damage over time
Potency: 75
Duration: 30s
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

jobActions.name: Glare
jobActions.description: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 290.

jobActions.name: Afflatus Misery
jobActions.description:
Deals unaspected damage to target and all enemies nearby it with a potency of 1,320 for the first enemy, and 50% less for all remaining enemies.
Can only be executed when the Blood Lily is in full bloom.
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

jobActions.name: Afflatus Rapture
jobActions.description:
Restores own HP and the HP of all nearby party members.
Cure Potency: 400
Additional Effect: Nourishes the Blood Lily
Healing Gauge Cost: 1 Lily

jobActions.name: Temperance
jobActions.description:
Increases healing magic potency by 20%, while reducing damage taken by self and all party members within a radius of 50 yalms by 10%.
Duration: 20s
Additional Effect: Grants Divine Grace
Duration: 30s
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

jobActions.name: Glare III
jobActions.description:
Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 330.
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

jobActions.name: Holy III
jobActions.description:
Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 150 to all nearby enemies.
Additional Effect: Stun
Duration: 4s

jobActions.name: Aquaveil
jobActions.description:
Reduces damage taken by a party member or self by 15%.
Duration: 8s

jobActions.name: Liturgy of the Bell
jobActions.description:
Places a healing blossom at the designated location and grants 5 stacks of Liturgy of the Bell to self.
Duration: 20s
Taking damage will expend 1 stack of Liturgy of the Bell to heal self and all party members within a radius of 20 yalms.
Cure Potency: 400
The effect of this action can only be triggered once per second.
Any remaining stacks of Liturgy of the Bell will trigger an additional healing effect when time expires or upon executing this action a second time.
Cure Potency: 200 for every remaining stack of Liturgy of the Bell
This action does not share a recast timer with any other actions.

jobActions.name: Glare IV
jobActions.description:
Deals unaspected damage to target and all enemies nearby it with a potency of 640 for the first enemy, and 40% less for all remaining enemies.
Can only be executed while Sacred Sight is active.

jobActions.name: Medica III
jobActions.description:
Restores own HP and the HP of all nearby party members.
Cure Potency: 250
Additional Effect: Regen
Cure Potency: 175
Duration: 15s

jobActions.name: Divine Caress
jobActions.description:
Creates a barrier around self and all party members near you that absorbs damage equivalent to a heal of 400 potency.
Duration: 10s
Additional Effect: Grants Divine Aura when barrier effect expires
Divine Aura Effect: Healing over time
Cure Potency: 200
Duration: 15s
Can only be executed while Divine Grace is active.

roleActions.name: Repose
roleActions.description:
Afflicts target with Sleep.
Duration: 30s
Cancels auto-attack upon execution.

roleActions.name: Esuna
roleActions.description: Removes a single detrimental effect from target.

roleActions.name: Lucid Dreaming
roleActions.description:
Gradually restores own MP.
Potency: 55
Duration: 21s

roleActions.name: Swiftcast
roleActions.description:
Next spell is cast immediately.
Duration: 10s
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

roleActions.name: Surecast
roleActions.description:
Spells can be cast without interruption.
Additional Effect: Nullifies most knockback and draw-in effects
Duration: 6s

roleActions.name: Rescue
roleActions.description: Instantly draws target party member to your side. Cannot be used outside of combat or when target is suffering from certain enfeeblements.

traits.name: Stone Mastery
traits.description: Upgrades Stone to Stone II.

traits.name: Maim and Mend
traits.description: Increases base action damage and HP restoration by 10%.

traits.name: Freecure
traits.description:
Grants a 15% chance that after casting Cure, the MP cost for your next Cure II will be 0.
Duration: 15s

traits.name: Maim and Mend II
traits.description: Increases base action damage and HP restoration by 30%.

traits.name: Aero Mastery
traits.description: Upgrades Aero to Aero II.

traits.name: Secret of the Lily
traits.description: Adds a Lily to your Healing Gauge for every 20 seconds you are engaged in combat, up to a maximum of 3.

traits.name: Stone Mastery II
traits.description: Upgrades Stone II to Stone III.

traits.name: Stone Mastery III
traits.description: Upgrades Stone III to Stone IV.

traits.name: Aero Mastery II
traits.description: Upgrades Aero II to Dia.

traits.name: Stone Mastery IV
traits.description: Upgrades Stone IV to Glare.

traits.name: Transcendent Afflatus
traits.description: Adds a Blood Lily to the Healing Gauge that blooms after three uses of Afflatus Solace or Afflatus Rapture.

traits.name: Enhanced Asylum
traits.description: Adds an additional effect to Asylum that increases HP recovery via healing actions by 10%.

traits.name: Glare Mastery
traits.description: Upgrades Glare to Glare III.

traits.name: Holy Mastery
traits.description: Upgrades Holy to Holy III.

traits.name: Enhanced Healing Magic
traits.description: Increases the healing potency of Cure to 500, Medica to 400, Cure II to 800, Regen to 250, Cure III to 600, Medica II to 250, Medica II's Regen effect to 150, Afflatus Solace to 800, and Afflatus Rapture to 400.

traits.name: Enhanced Divine Benison
traits.description:
Allows the accumulation of charges for consecutive uses of Divine Benison.
Maximum Charges: 2

traits.name: Enhanced Presence of Mind
traits.description:
Presence of Mind grants 3 stacks of Sacred Sight upon execution.
Duration: 30s

traits.name: White Magic Mastery
traits.description: Increases the potency of Dia and its damage over time to 75, Afflatus Misery to 1,320, and Glare III to 330.

traits.name: Medica Mastery
traits.description: Upgrades Medica II to Medica III.

traits.name: Enhanced Tetragrammaton
traits.description:
Allows the accumulation of charges for consecutive uses of Tetragrammaton.
Maximum Charges: 2

traits.name: Enhanced Temperance
traits.description:
Temperance grants Divine Grace upon execution.
Duration: 30s
